title: align shapes in fontlab?
content:
I can’t figure it out.

Someone tell me how.
author: fredcastle

comments.content:
You mean an option for making shapes lighter?

Tools -\> Actions -\> Effect -\> Bold -\> use negative values.  
Or do it manually via Contour -\> Interpolate Nodes -\> then drag nodes.
AFAIK there isn’t an auto-align tool.

Oh.

See what you did? Now you made me type stuff that wasn’t even necessary! :p
